channel.title: Performance-Optimization on Technical Partner for Startups | Damian Galarza, Fractional CTO

item.title: AssetPath with ActionController::Metal
item.description: Getting proper asset paths with the asset pipeline while working with a controller which doesn’t inherit from ActionController::Base can be a bit confusing. Learn how to get it working here.
